original_text: So God said to him, ‘You have not asked me to give you a long life, or to make you very rich. You have not asked me to punish your enemies with death. Instead you have asked for a wise mind so that you can rule well. Because of that, I will give you what you have asked for. Yes, I now give to you a wise mind that understands things well. You will be wiser than anyone who has already lived and wiser than anyone who will live after you.
korean_text: 내가 네 말대로 하여 네게 지혜롭고 총명한 마음을 주노니 네 앞에도 너와 같은 자가 없었거니와 네 뒤에도 너와 같은 자가 일어남이 없으리라

sentences.original_text: You have not asked me to give you a long life
or to make you very rich
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 매우 부하게 해달라고도 구하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: You have not asked me to punish your enemies with death
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나에게 네 대적들을 죽음으로 벌달라고도 구하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: Instead you have asked for a wise mind
so that you can rule well
sentences.korean_translation: 그것으로 네가 잘 다스릴 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: I will give you what you have asked for
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네가 구한 것을 너에게 주겠다

sentences.original_text: Yes, I now give to you a wise mind
sentences.korean_translation: 그래, 내가 이제 너에게 지혜로운 마음을 주노라

sentences.original_text: You will be wiser than anyone who has already lived
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이미 살았던 누구보다 더 지혜로울 것이고

sentences.original_text: and wiser than anyone who will live after you
sentences.korean_translation: 너 후에 살게 될 누구보다도 더 지혜로울 것이다
